title: Steph McGovern praised by Have I Got News For You fans for Girly Swot jumper
text:
Steph McGovern, what a jumper (Picture: BBC)

BBC presenter Steph McGovern was wildly praised on Friday for her brilliant turn as host on Have I Got News From You.

Whether it was her epic Girly Swot sweater – a riff on Boris Johnson’s much derided insult to David Cameron – or her willingness to let the panel shout the word ‘c**k’ over and over again, viewers at home called on the Beeb to hire the star full time.

‘Brilliant to see the Head Girly Swot #StephMcgovern on #HIGNFY – I can see an older male foil being auditioned here,’ shared one impressed fan.

Another added: ‘I love you @stephbreakfast just superb on @haveigotnews tonight.

‘Queer, northern woman – can’t help but think we need a few more of them on TV.’

‘I have to say, @stephbreakfast is so good at hosting #HIGNFY,’ tweeted another fan while she was also called ‘super’ and ‘brilliant’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Steph was the guest host alongside regular team captains Ian Hislop and Paul Merton and panellists comedian Miles Jupp and journalist Camilla Long.

The show covered the Brexit extension, Prince Harry & Prince William’s alleged feud, and Tony Bowman becoming the world’s fastest 84-year-old.

Catch all-new #HIGNFY, hosted by @stephbreakfast, with panellists Miles Jupp and @camillalong. Tonight at 9pm – Only on BBC One. pic.twitter.com/zbu6q7sKeA — Have I Got News For You (@haveigotnews) October 25, 2019

The BBC confirmed this week that Steph would be leaving the Breakfast show for her own show on Channel 4 in 2020.

Steph, who is expecting her first child, allowed the ribbing that took place before she put them in their place: ‘Listen lads, jealousy will get you nowhere!’

Steph said it was a one-off sadly (Picture: BBC)

She later confirmed however that her jumper was made specifically for the show by Steph and her friend, although she would look into the possibility of it becoming widely available.

‘For those asking where my jumper is from….me+my mate @jamesmobbs designed it then got @balconyshirts to print it. Let me chat to them about best way to buy one. I’ll report back…. #girlyswot Ps. I’m not making money from it. Just spreading the Girly Swot love,’ she shared.

For those asking where my jumper is from….me+my mate @jamesmobbs designed it then got @balconyshirts to print it. Let me chat to them about best way to buy one. I’ll report back…. #girlyswot 🙋🏼‍♀️

Ps. I’m not making money from it. Just spreading the Girly Swot love. — Steph McGovern (@stephbreakfast) October 25, 2019

Advertisement

Advertisement

Steph, 37, revealed her baby news on Twitter, joking about the time she denied speculation she was pregnant by explaining it was a ‘pot belly’.

The presenter tweeted: ‘I see my news is out! Yep, I am no longer with pot belly……I am now with child. #babyonboard’.

It is thought Steph is due in November although both Steph and her girlfriend have decided to keep details about the pregnancy as private as possible, and ‘won’t be doing magazine shoots any time soon’.

description: BBC presenter Steph McGovern was wildly praised on Friday for her brilliant turn as host on Have I Got News From You. Whether it was her epic Girly Swot sweater...
